desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Flaming Red Bolognese.

value.name: Farina
value.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

value.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
value.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

value.name: Pomodoro
value.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

value.name: Spaghetti al rag첫 fiammante
value.desc: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The meaty, herby aroma really gets your appetite going.

value.name: Lisa
value.desc: La languida ma estremamente colta bibliotecaria dei Cavalieri di Favonius, ritenuta dalla Akademiya di Sumeru la studentessa pi첫 illustre degli ultimi due secoli.

value.name: Spaghetti al rag첫 misteriosi
value.desc: Lisa's specialty. With an inexplicable aura, this bolognese is so exotic that you can never have enough. Did she actually enchant it with some kind of magic?
